March 7 (Reuters) - Brookfield Asset Management Inc

* Brookfield asset management announces proposed offering of notes

* Brookfield asset management inc - commencing a public offering, subject to market and other conditions, of us$500 million of notes due 2024

* Brookfield asset management inc - notes will be issued by a subsidiary of brookfield, brookfield finance llc, and will be fully guaranteed by brookfield Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
